    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ActivationFunction
    An ActivationFunction maps a logit to an output.
    Activations
    Utility for obtaining (singleton) instances of activation functions.
    ActivationsCachedNeuron
    A Neuron that caches activations for later retrieval.
    ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation
    Represents a single activation of a neuron.
    AdaGrad<N>
     
    Adaline
     
    AdalineInitializer
     
    AdalineLineMain
     
    AdalineMain
     
    Adam<N>
     
    AdamW<N>
     
    Adapter
    Marks a type or member as part of the Adapter design pattern.
    ARGOptimizer<N>
    Custom optimizer that implements Cumulative with Reset Gradient Descent algorithm.
    AssociationUnit
     
    BackPropagation
     
    BasisFunction<N>
     
    BasisFunction.FeatureExtractor<N>
     
    BasisFunction.Generator<N>
     
    BatchLossFunction<N>
    Represents a loss function that operates at the batch level, i.e., across multiple samples.
    BatchRegime
    A training regime that performs classic batch training.
    BatchSizeConfigurable
    Interface for components that expose a configurable training batch size.
    BinaryCrossEntropy<N>
    Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) loss function.
    Builder
    Marks a type as an implementation of the Builder design pattern.
    ChainedRegime
    Composes and executes a chain of Regime decorators.
    ChainedRegime.Builder
    Builder for constructing instances of ChainedRegime.
    ClosedSolutionOptimizer<N>
     
    Composition
    Marks a class or type as using the Composition design pattern.
    ConstantInitializer
    Implements an initializer that sets all parameters (weights and bias) to a given constant.
    DataRenderer
     
    DataSet<N>
    Represents a data set.
    DataSet.Loader<N>
    Interface to load a data set.
    DataSet.Sample<N>
    The sample represents a single input for an estimation function and the corresponding expected outputs.
    Decorator
    Marks a class as participating in the Decorator design pattern.
    DefaultNeuralNetwork
    Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
    DelegatedRegime
    An abstract Regime implementation that delegates all training to another Regime.
    DesignPattern
    Marker for design pattern annotations.
    DesignPattern.Category
    Represents high-level categories of software design patterns.
    DimensionLossFunction<N>
    Represents a loss function that operates at the per-dimension level.
    DistanceMetric
    This class represents a specific distance metrics to calculate the distances.
    DomainObject
    Marks a class as a Domain Object.
    DoubleSupport
     
    DumpNodesRegime
    A Regime decorator that dumps the internal node activations of a NeuralNetwork before and/or after each training epoch.
    ElasticNet<N>
     
    Entity
    Marks a class as an Entity in the domain model.
    EpochConfigurable
    Marker interface for components that expose a configurable learning rate.
    EpochRegime
    A Regime decorator that repeats training for a fixed number of epochs.
    EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener
     
    EstimationFunction<N>
    The EstimationFunction.estimate(N[]) method defines the contract for mapping input values to output values according to a specific estimation algorithm.
    EuclideanDistance
    Concrete implementation of the DistanceMetric strategy that calculates the Euclidean distance between two points in n-dimensional space.
    ExplicitRegularization<N>
    Explicit regularization involves modifying the objective (loss) function directly by adding a penalty or changing the targets.
    Facade
    Marks a class or interface as a Facade in the Facade design pattern.
    FactoryMethod
    Marks a class or method as participating in the Factory Method design pattern.
    FeatureExtractor<N>
     
    FeatureMatrices
     
    Floats
    Implements utility functions to operate on floats
    FloatSupport
     
    GradientDescentModelDecomposer<E,N>
     
    GradientDescentModelDecomposer.GradientDecomposition<N>
     
    GradientDescentOptimizer<E,N>
     
    HeatMap
     
    HeInitializer
    He (Kaiming) weight initializer.
    Holder
    Marks a class or type as a Holder structure.
    HyperparameterConfigurable
    Interface for components that expose tunable hyperparameters.
    ImplicitRegularization<N>
    Implicit regularization comes from how the training is performed, not from an explicit penalty in the loss
    Initializer<E,N>
    Defines an initialization strategy for an EstimationFunction.
    InputNeuron
    Represents an input neuron in a neural network.
    Invertible<T>
     
    JavaNumberTypeSupport<N>
     
    KnnMain
     
    L2Regularization
     
    L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<N>
     
    LASSO<N>
     
    LastInputStoredNeuron
    A specialized Neuron that remembers the input values from its most recent activation.
    LearningRateConfigurable<N>
    Marker interface for components that expose a configurable learning rate.
    LeastMeanSquares
     
    Linear
    This activation function, also known as Identity or "no-activation" just returns the logit as output.
    LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>
     
    LinearBasisFunctionModelDecomposer<N>
     
    LinearCombination<N>
    A simple linear scalar model of the form:
    LinearModel<N>

    LinesAndCircles
     
    LogicalDataSets
     
    LossFunction<N>
    Marker interface for all types of loss functions.
    Mark1
     
    MarkerInterface
    Indicates that the annotated type or member is a Marker Interface pattern.
    Matrices
     
    Matrix<N>
     
    MeanError<N>
    A loss function implementation that computes the mean error across samples or batches.
    Mediator
    Marks a class or interface as part of the Mediator design pattern.
    Metrics
    Utility for obtaining (singleton) instances of distance metrics.
    MiniBatchRegime
    A training regime that performs mini-batch training.
    MLPLineMain
     
    MLPXorMain
     
    MnistReader
     
    MnistReader.MnistData
     
    ModelComplexity
     
    ModelIterativeLearning

    ModelVariance
     
    MultiLayerPerceptron
     
    NearestNeighbors
     
    NearestNeighborsPreparer
     
    NeighborWeighting
     
    NeuralNetwork
    Represents a neural network as a specific kind of EstimationFunction.
    NeuralNetworkInitializer
    The initializer is used to set the initial parameter value of a neuron
    NeuralNetworkInitializers
    Utility for obtaining (singleton) instances of initializers.
    NeuralNetworkOptimizers
     
    NeuralNetworks
    Utility methods for Neural Networks
    Neuron
    Represents a single artificial neuron in a neural network.
    NeuronFunction
    A neuron-like scalar function that combines a LinearCombination with a non-linear ActivationFunction.
    NeuronVisitor
    A visitor interface for traversing a NeuralNetwork.
    NewOptimizers
     
    Notations
     
    NumberTypeAgnostic<N>
     
    ObjectiveFunction<N>
    Represents an objective function that extends the concept of a LossFunction to provide both loss aggregation and gradient computation.
    ObjectiveFunctionImpl<N>
    The implementation of the ObjectiveFunction.
    ObjectiveGradientEstimator<N>
     
    ObjectiveReportingRegime
    A Regime decorator that wraps another training regime and reports the objective (loss) value at each epoch.
    Objectives
    Provides commonly used ObjectiveFunction implementations as reusable, static singletons.
    OneShotRegime
     
    OptimizationLearningRateSize
     
    OptimizationModelComplexity
     
    Optimizer<E,N>
    Defines an optimization algorithm for training an EstimationFunction.
    Optimizer.Stochastic<E,N>
    An Optimizer variant that is restricted to online (sample-by-sample) optimization.
    Pair<L,R>
    This class is a composition of 2 objects, named left and right.
    Perceptron
     
    PerceptronInitializer
     
    PerceptronUpdateRule
     
    Plot
     
    PolynomialFunction<N>
     
    PolynomialFunction.Generator<N>
     
    Proxy
    Marks a type or method as an implementation of the Proxy design pattern.
    RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer
    Implements a random initializer.
    Rational<N>
     
    RationalBigIntegerSupport
     
    RationalIntegerSupport
     
    RationalLongSupport
     
    Regime
    Defines a training regime for machine learning models.
    Regimes
    Static factory methods for creating and configuring common Regime strategies.
    Regularization<N>
     
    Regularization.Effect
     
    Regularization.Effect.Type

    Regularization.Mechanism.Type

    RegularizationFactory<N>
     
    Regularizations
     
    ReLU
    Implements the Rectified Linear Unit (ReLU).
    Ridge<N>
     
    RMSProp<N>
     
    SampleLossFunction<N>
    Represents a loss function that operates at the per-sample level.
    ScalarEstimationFunction<N>
    A specialization of EstimationFunction for functions that produce a single scalar output.
    ScaledError<N>
    A decorator loss function that applies a fixed scaling factor to the results of another loss function.
    Sigmoid
    Concrete ActivationFunction implementing the logistic sigmoid:
    SimpleHolder<K>
    A simple generic holder class that encapsulates a value of type K.
    SquaredError<N>
    A DimensionLossFunction that computes the squared error between an estimated value and its target value.
    StaticFactory
    Marks a class, method, or constructor as implementing the Static Factory pattern.
    StaticUtility
    Marks a class as a Static Utility class: - Only static methods - No state (no instance fields) - Not meant to be instantiated
    Step
    Implements the step activation.
    StochasticRegime
    A training regime that performs stochastic training.
    Strategy
    Marks a class or interface as part of the Strategy Pattern.
    Strategy.Role
    Represents the role of a class or interface within the Strategy design pattern.
    SummedError<N>
    A loss function implementation that computes the sum of errors rather than their mean.
    SyntheticDataSets
     
    SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N>
     
    Table
     
    TemplateMethod
    Marks a class or method as participating in the Template Method design pattern.
    Threads
     
    TrainableFunction<N>
    A function with trainable parameters that can be estimated and updated.
    TrainableScalarFunction<N>
    A scalar-valued function that is both TrainableFunction and ScalarEstimationFunction.
    Trainer<E,N>
    Defines a configurable trainer for EstimationFunctions.
    TrainerImpl<E,N>
    Default implementation of the Trainer interface.
    TrainingSetSize
     
    Transposable<T>

    TypedVector<N>

    Marks a class as a Value Object in the domain model.

    Vectors

    Represents the Visitor design pattern.
    XavierInitializer
    Xavier (Glorot) weight initializer.
